div.div: NOT A STORM TIL WEATHER CHANNEL NAMES IT

div.a: The Weather Channel's Plans For Global Domination

div.div: Say goodbye to your local weatherman.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ye2xCq&via=Digg&text=The Weather Channel's Plans For Global Domination

div.a: The Many (Many, Many) Faces Of Internet Multiples

div.div: This is Lillian. She's never alone. Along with Mia, Rebecca, Julie, Pastel, Jennifer, Katelynn, Luna and “17,” she is part of the JC Klatch, a system of individuals (don’t call them personalities) who have lived together inside the same physical body for as long as they can remember.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zhilsd&via=Digg&text=The Many (Many, Many) Faces Of Internet Multiples

div.a: 9 Fascinating Phallus Facts

div.div: There's all kinds of interesting facts and facets to the human penis and there are some in the animal world that could easily have been designed by Dali. Now's your chance to get to know them a little better.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VMG0Rx&via=Digg&text=9 Fascinating Phallus Facts

div.a: Over Or Under: The Great Toilet Paper Debate

div.div: The eternal question: Should toilet paper hang over or under? Modern engineering has created an efficient way to dispense toilet paper, but it has left orientation up to consumer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W8if5e&via=Digg&text=Over Or Under: The Great Toilet Paper Debate

div.a: The Outlaw Life Of A Train Hopper

div.div: Mike Brodie spent ten years hopping freight trains, covering 50,000 miles and 46 states on more than 170 train rides.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WMV4uA&via=Digg&text=The Outlaw Life Of A Train Hopper

div.a: The Snapchat Lawsuit, Or How To Lose Your Best Friend Over $70 Million

div.div: “This is a case of partners betraying a fellow partner.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YEj6dO&via=Digg&text=The Snapchat Lawsuit, Or How To Lose Your Best Friend Over $70 Million

div.a: A First Draft Of The Third War

div.div: Why President Obama should commission a history of targeted killing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZehSHq&via=Digg&text=A First Draft Of The Third War

div.a: Why Are Sharks Swarming In Florida?

div.div: They were practically right on the sand," lifeguard supervisor Craig Pollock told the Palm Beach Daily News. "They were frenzied and chasing bait all the way up to shore." Beaches around the area are now closed to swimmers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10m6sEe&via=Digg&text=Why Are Sharks Swarming In Florida?

div.a: Your Brain On Cookies

div.div: Just like any addictive substance, you eventually need more and more of it to get your “fix” as your brain adjusts. So do be careful around cookies.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XAfJ8c&via=Digg&text=Your Brain On Cookies

div.a: How To Get An Office Spouse

div.div: From nine to five, they're the most important person in your life. The person you exchange knowing looks with when Mitch from Marketing snores during the meeting or freak out to after you hit "Reply All" on a particularly humiliating e-mail.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XU1avH&via=Digg&text=How To Get An Office Spouse

div.a: Disney Is Done With Hand-Drawn Animation

div.div: Disney, the Hollywood titan which brought the world classics such as Fantasia, Bambi and Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, has admitted it has no current plans to make hand drawn animated films.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zi7nzj&via=Digg&text=Disney Is Done With Hand-Drawn Animation

div.a: Don't Make This Guy Cry – Download The New Version Of The Digg App!

div.div: This is Rob. He built the Digg app. He's an amazing, hardworking guy. All he wants in life is for you to download and love the new version of the Digg iOS app. Come on, just look at that face! How can you say no to that? We know you'll do the right thing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P0MfyA&via=Digg&text=Don't Make This Guy Cry – Download The New Version Of The Digg App!

div.a: You Spend 23 Days A Year On Your Phone

div.div: You spend more than three weeks a year looking at your phone. That's probably more time than some of us spend looking at our significant others.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16bS6Xh&via=Digg&text=You Spend 23 Days A Year On Your Phone

div.a: The Internet According To The Oatmeal

div.div: There are things to know about Matthew Inman—very few of them actually matter. But what matters with Inman is that on an Internet of loudmouths, he speaks for everyone.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15qbSgq&via=Digg&text=The Internet According To The Oatmeal

div.a: Pixar's Senior Scientist Explains How Math Makes The Movies We Love

div.div: Applied research by Tony DeRose and his colleagues takes animators from simple polygons to the limits of geometric storytelling.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15AoZMi&via=Digg&text=Pixar's Senior Scientist Explains How Math Makes The Movies We Love

div.a: Wearable Soundscapes From Canada

div.div: These shirts provide a form of bio feedback using data from the wearer’s heart rate to determine what “sounds” they hear through the speaker embedded in the collar of the garment.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YwZg43&via=Digg&text=Wearable Soundscapes From Canada

div.div: YOUR BOSS REALLY IS WATCHING YOU

div.a: Tracking Sensors Invade The Workplace

div.div: As Big Data becomes a fixture of office life, companies are turning to tracking devices to gather real-time information on how teams of employees work and interact.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZdZFd3&via=Digg&text=Tracking Sensors Invade The Workplace

div.a: How Would Most People Like To Die?

div.div: Given the choice of life in a vegetative state versus a quick, painless death, most doctors chose the latter. See why.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WN3wd6&via=Digg&text=How Would Most People Like To Die?

div.a: Pablo Neruda To Be Exhumed In April

div.div: The Nobel prize-winning poet’s remains will soon be subject to a rousing forensic examination. Judge Mario Carroza has declared that Neruda’s body will be exhumed in April, in order to investigate the possibility of his having been murdered.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13HLdNS&via=Digg&text=Pablo Neruda To Be Exhumed In April

div.a: The Left Brain Is Rational, And Other Lies You've Been Told About Neuroscience

div.div: Here is a list of common misconceptions surrounding "Folk Neuroscience" — a term clinical and neuropsychologist Vaughan Bell uses to describe the imprecise, "sometimes wildly inaccurate," concepts that are commonly used to explain the brain.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YdgFM5&via=Digg&text=The Left Brain Is Rational, And Other Lies You've Been Told About Neuroscience

div.div: ALWAYS REMEMBER: IT WILL MAKE YOU POOP

div.a: The Comprehensive, Fully Caffeinated Guide To Coffee At Work

div.div: Here’s everything you ever wanted to know about coffee at work, but were too over- or under-caffeinated to ask.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XYuwGU&via=Digg&text=The Comprehensive, Fully Caffeinated Guide To Coffee At Work

div.div: 'SOME OF MY BEST FRIENDS ARE BLACK'

div.a: The Good, Racist People

div.div: The idea that racism lives in the heart of particularly evil individuals, as opposed to the heart of a democratic society, is reinforcing to anyone who might, from time to time, find their tongue sprinting ahead of their discretion.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13GxeIf&via=Digg&text=The Good, Racist People

div.a: Iconic Red Cup Gets Morphed Into Faux-Bougie Drinkware

div.div: I guess people weren’t feeling classy enough pouring wine into the same old red cups at every outdoor BBQ they attended.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XY7Arg&via=Digg&text=Iconic Red Cup Gets Morphed Into Faux-Bougie Drinkware

div.a: 'Game Of Thrones' Can Be Told In 80 Hours

div.div: “We have the opportunity here to tell a coherent story that lasts for 80 hours,” the show's creators said. That’s if HBO greenlights the rest of the story.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WYg9Ib&via=Digg&text='Game Of Thrones' Can Be Told In 80 Hours

div.a: 7 Examples Of Jon Stewart's Cowardice On 'The Daily Show'

div.div: Why does Jon Stewart wimp out so often?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W7S7HK&via=Digg&text=7 Examples Of Jon Stewart's Cowardice On 'The Daily Show'

div.div: THE ART OF MACRO AND MICRO

div.a: Sun Tzu Would Have Ruled At StarCraft

div.div: Sun Tzu, who wrote The Art of War circa the sixth century BC, would have been unbeatable at StarCraft II.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WwlLsH&via=Digg&text=Sun Tzu Would Have Ruled At StarCraft

div.a: Men Who Don't Want To Have Sex

div.div: The sitcom stereotype goes like this: Guy is always horny, guy tries to have sex with girl, girl shoots him down. But has the script been flipped?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/104iKAZ&via=Digg&text=Men Who Don't Want To Have Sex

div.a: Post-Sandy Hook School Guard Accidentally Fires Gun In School

div.div: A New York town that began assigning an armed police officer to guard a high school in the wake of the Connecticut massacre has suspended the program after an officer accidentally discharged his pistol in a hallway while classes were in session.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12x5037&via=Digg&text=Post-Sandy Hook School Guard Accidentally Fires Gun In School

div.a: Every Single One Of These Objects Is Made Of Paper

div.div: A dusty old chair, a wrinkled pair of jean shorts, or the classic shape of a wooden Eames chair, common items you might encounter every day without giving them a second thought. The twist is they're all made of paper.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZizbDK&via=Digg&text=Every Single One Of These Objects Is Made Of Paper

div.a: Did Black Slave Owners Exist?

div.div: Yes -- but why they did and how many they owned will surprise you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WCTsUa&via=Digg&text=Did Black Slave Owners Exist?

div.div: DENNIS RODMAN IS OUR BEST DETERRENT

div.a: Could North Korea Really Hit Us With A Nuke?

div.div: In a predictably insane but still unsettling development, North Korea has declared its interest in a "preemptive" nuclear strike against the United States. The bluster comes ahead of a UN vote on tougher sanctions, and is largely just posturing. But if it came down to it, could they follow through?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10lqGhc&via=Digg&text=Could North Korea Really Hit Us With A Nuke?
